snippet: Sharing a stage to entertain and — dare they say it? — even educate, Jon Stewart and Bill O’Reilly squared off on some of the most serious policy issues facing the nation.
abstract: Sharing a stage to entertain and — dare they say it? — even educate, Jon Stewart and Bill O’Reilly squared off on some of the most serious policy issues facing the nation.
lead_paragraph: Sharing a stage to entertain and — dare they say it? — even educate, Jon Stewart and Bill O’Reilly squared off on some of the most serious policy issues facing the nation. Read more.

headline.main: Stewart and O’Reilly Share Stage in Political Joust
